org.cresques.geo

Interface Projected

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FLayer, FLyrRaster, GraphicLayer, SingleLayer, VectorLayer, ViewPortData
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultFLyrRaster, DefaultGraphicLayer, DefaultViewPortData, FLayers, FLyrDefault, FLyrVect, GeoPoint, Hoja, MapContext, MapSheetsGrid, ProjPoint, UtmPoint, ViewPortData

    public interface Projected

    Projected should be implement by all objects that can be re-projected.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Returns the current projection.
      void reProject(ICoordTrans ct)
      Changes projection of the graphical information of this object.
